foreign_names.name: Saurierzähmung
foreign_names.text: Schaue dir die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst davon eine Dinosaurier-Karte oder eine Länderkarte offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreign_names.name: En comunión con dinosaurios
foreign_names.text: Mira las cinco primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes mostrar una carta de Dinosaurio o de tierra que se encuentre entre ellas y ponerla en tu mano. Pon el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.

foreign_names.name: Communion avec les dinosaures
foreign_names.text: Regardez les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez révéler une carte de dinosaure ou de terrain parmi elles et la mettre dans votre main. Mettez le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans l'ordre de votre choix.

foreign_names.name: Sintonia con i Dinosauri
foreign_names.text: Guarda le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi rivelare una carta Dinosauro o terra scelta tra esse e aggiungerla alla tua mano. Metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.

foreign_names.name: 恐竜との融和
foreign_names.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを５枚見る。あなたはその中から、恐竜か土地であるカード１枚を公開してあなたの手札に加えてもよい。残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置く。

foreign_names.name: 공룡과의 대화
foreign_names.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 다섯 장을 본다. 당신은 그 중에서 공룡이나 대지 카드 한 장을 공개하고 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 나머지 카드들은 당신이 원하는 순서로 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓는다.

foreign_names.name: Comungar com os Dinossauros
foreign_names.text: Olhe os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode revelar um card de Dinossauro ou terreno dentre eles e colocá-lo em sua mão. Coloque o restante no fundo de seu grimório em qualquer ordem.

foreign_names.name: Общение с Динозаврами
foreign_names.text: Посмотрите пять верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Вы можете показать находящуюся среди них карту Динозавра или земли и положить ее в вашу руку. Положите остальные карты в низ вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.

foreign_names.name: 恐龙商谈
foreign_names.text: 检视你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以展示其中的一张恐龙或地牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

foreign_names.name: 恐龍商談
foreign_names.text: 檢視你牌庫頂的五張牌。你可以展示其中的一張恐龍或地牌，並將它置於你手上。將其餘的牌以任意順序置於你牌庫底。

name: Commune with Dinosaurs
original_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Dinosaur or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: If an effect refers to a “[subtype] spell” or “[subtype] card,” it refers only to a spell or card that has that subtype. For example, March of the Drowned is a card that benefits Pirates and features Pirates in its illustration, but it isn’t a Pirate card.

text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Dinosaur or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

foreign_names.name: Marodierender Raptor
foreign_names.text:
Kreaturenzauber, die du wirkst, kosten beim Wirken {1} weniger.
Immer wenn eine andere Kreatur unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, fügt ihr der Marodierende Raptor 2 Schadenspunkte zu. Falls einem Dinosaurier auf diese Weise Schaden zugefügt wird, erhält der Marodierende Raptor +2/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreign_names.flavor:
"¡No te muevas e intenta no parecer una presa!".

foreign_names.name: Ráptor merodeador
foreign_names.text:
Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar los hechizos de criatura.
Siempre que otra criatura entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, el Ráptor merodeador le hace 2 puntos de daño. Si un Dinosaurio recibe daño de esta manera, el Ráptor merodeador obtiene +2/+0 hasta el final del turno.

Les sorts de créature que vous lancez coûtent {1} de moins à lancer.
À chaque fois qu'une autre créature arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, le Raptor en maraude lui inflige 2 blessures. Si un dinosaure subit des blessures de cette manière, le Raptor en maraude gagne +2/+0 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

당신이 발동하는 생물 주문들은 발동하는 데 {1}이 덜 든다.

rulings.text: Effects that reduce the generic mana cost of a spell (such as that of Marauding Raptor) can’t reduce that spell’s colored mana requirements.
Marauding Raptor’s cost reduction doesn’t affect itself.

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of a Dinosaur spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the creature remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

If an effect refers to a “[subtype] spell” or “[subtype] card,” it refers only to a spell or card that has that subtype. For example, March of the Drowned is a card that benefits Pirates and features Pirates in its illustration, but it isn’t a Pirate card.

name: Lava Coil
original_text: Lava Coil deals 4 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: Lava Coil’s replacement effect will exile the target creature if it would die this turn for any reason, not just due to lethal damage. It applies to the target creature even if Lava Coil deals no damage to it (due to a prevention effect).

text: Lava Coil deals 4 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

name: Rampaging Ferocidon
original_text:
Menace
Players can't gain life.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, Rampaging Ferocidon deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

rulings.text: Spells and abilities that cause players to gain life still resolve while Rampaging Ferocidon is on the battlefield. No player will gain life, but any other effects of that spell or ability will happen.
If an effect says to set a player’s life total to a number that’s higher than the player’s current life total while Rampaging Ferocidon is on the battlefield, the player’s life total doesn’t change.
Rampaging Ferocidon’s last ability triggers whenever any player has a creature enter the battlefield, including you.
If another creature enters the battlefield at the same time as Rampaging Ferocidon, its last ability triggers.

name: Savage Stomp
original_text: Savage Stomp costs {2} less to cast if it targets a Dinosaur you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

rulings.text: You can’t cast Savage Stomp unless you choose both a creature you control and a creature you don’t control as targets.
If either target is an illegal target as Savage Stomp resolves, neither creature will deal or be dealt damage.

If the creature you control is an illegal target as Savage Stomp tries to resolve, you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it. If that creature is a legal target but the other creature isn’t, you’ll still put the counter on the creature you control.

name: Ripjaw Raptor

rulings.text: If multiple sources deal damage to a creature with an enrage ability at the same time, most likely because multiple creatures blocked that creature, the enrage ability triggers only once.

If lethal damage is dealt to a creature with an enrage ability, that ability triggers. The creature with that enrage ability leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, so it won’t be affected by the resolving ability.

この呪文は打ち消されない。
プロテクション（青）（このクリーチャーは青のものによっては、ブロックされず、対象にならず、ダメージを与えられず、エンチャントされず、装備されない。）
{G}：ターン終了時まで、変容するケラトプスは、到達かトランプルか速攻のうちあなたが選んだ１つを得る。

foreign_names.name: 요동치는 케라톱스
foreign_names.text:
이 주문은 무효화될 수 없다.
청색으로부터 보호 (이 생물은 청색 원천에게 방어될 수 없고, 청색 원천의 목표로 정해질 수 없고, 청색 원천으로부터 피해를 입지 않고, 청색 원천이 부여되거나 장착될 수 없다.)
{G}: 요동치는 케라톱스는 턴종료까지 대공, 돌진, 또는 신속 중 당신이 선택한 능력 한 가지를 얻는다.

foreign_names.name: Cerátopo-camaleão
foreign_names.text:
Esta mágica não pode ser anulada.
Proteção contra o azul (Esta criatura não pode ser bloqueada, ser alvo, sofrer dano, ser encantada nem equipada por nada azul.)
{G}: Cerátopo-camaleão ganha alcance, atropelar ou ímpeto, à sua escolha, até o final do turno.

foreign_names.name: Увертливый Цератопс
foreign_names.text:
Это заклинание не может быть отменено.
Защита от синего (Синие объекты не могут блокировать это существо, делать его своей целью, наносить ему повреждения, зачаровывать или снаряжать.)
{G}: Увертливый Цератопс по вашему выбору получает Захват, Пробивной удар или Ускорение до конца хода.

foreign_names.name: 变幻犄角龙
foreign_names.text:
此咒语不能被反击。
反蓝保护（此生物不能被蓝色的东西阻挡、指定为目标、造成伤害、结附或是装备。）
{G}：选择延势，践踏或敏捷。变幻犄角龙获得该异能直到回合结束。

foreign_names.name: 變幻犄角龍
foreign_names.text:
此咒語不能被反擊。
反藍保護（此生物不能被藍色的東西阻擋、指定為目標、造成傷害、結附或是裝備。）
{G}：選擇延勢，踐踏或敏捷。變幻犄角龍獲得該異能直到回合結束。

name: Shifting Ceratops
original_text: This spell can't be countered. Protection from blue (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything blue.) {G}: Shifting Ceratops gains your choice of reach, trample, or haste until end of turn.

rulings.text: A spell or ability that counters spells can still target Shifting Ceratops. When that spell or ability resolves, Shifting Ceratops won’t be countered, but any additional effects of that spell or ability will still happen.
Multiple instances of reach, trample, and/or haste on the same creature are redundant.

text:
This spell can't be countered.
Protection from blue (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything blue.)
{G}: Shifting Ceratops gains your choice of reach, trample, or haste until end of turn.

foreign_names.name: Unberechenbarer Ceratops
foreign_names.text:
Dieser Zauberspruch kann nicht neutralisiert werden.
Schutz vor Blau (Diese Kreatur kann von nichts Blauem geblockt oder als Ziel bestimmt werden, von ihm Schaden zugefügt bekommen oder von ihm verzaubert oder ausgerüstet werden.)
{G}: Der Unberechenbare Ceratops erhält bis zum Ende des Zuges entweder Reichweite, Eile oder verursacht Trampelschaden (du entscheidest).

foreign_names.name: Ceratops cambiante
foreign_names.text:
Este hechizo no puede ser contrarrestado.
Protección contra azul. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada, hecha objetivo, recibir daño, estar encantada o ser equipada por nada azul.)
{G}: El Ceratops cambiante gana a tu elección la habilidad de alcance, arrollar o prisa hasta el final del turno.

foreign_names.name: Cératops changeant
foreign_names.text:
Ce sort ne peut pas être contrecarré.
Protection contre le bleu (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée, ciblée, blessée, enchantée ou équipée par quoi que ce soit de bleu.)
{G} : Le Cératops changeant acquiert, selon votre choix, la portée, le piétinement ou la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreign_names.name: Triceratopo Mutevole
foreign_names.text:
Questa magia non può essere neutralizzata.
Protezione dal blu (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata, bersagliata, non le può essere inflitto danno, né può essere incantata o equipaggiata da nulla di blu.)
{G}: Il Triceratopo Mutevole ha a tua scelta raggiungere, travolgere o rapidità fino alla fine del turno.

flavor:
"Seeing a pack of these monsters hunt together, I'm at a loss to imagine the size of their prey."
—Adrian Adanto of Lujio

foreign_names.flavor: „Wenn ich diese Monster gemeinsam jagen sehe, will ich mir nicht vorstellen, was für Beute sie zufriedenstellt." —Adrian Adanto von Lujio
foreign_names.name: Regisaurus-Alphatier
foreign_names.text:
Andere Dinosaurier, die du kontrollierst, haben Eile.
Wenn das Regisaurus-Alphatier ins Spiel kommt, erzeuge einen 3/3 grünen Dinosaurier-Kreaturenspielstein, der Trampelschaden verursacht.

foreign_names.flavor: "Después de ver que varios de esos monstruos se unían para cazar juntos, no puedo imaginarme el tamaño de su presa". —Adrián Adanto de Lujio
foreign_names.name: Regisaurio alfa
foreign_names.text:
Los otros Dinosaurios que controlas tienen la habilidad de prisa.
Cuando el Regisaurio alfa entre al campo de batalla, crea una ficha de criatura Dinosaurio verde 3/3 con la habilidad de arrollar.

foreign_names.flavor: « Quand je vois ces monstres chasser en meute, je n'ose imaginer la taille de leur proie. » —Adrian Adanto de Lujio
foreign_names.name: Régisaure alpha
foreign_names.text:
Les autres dinosaures que vous contrôlez ont la célérité.
Quand le Régisaure alpha arrive sur le champ de bataille, créez un jeton de créature 3/3 verte Dinosaure avec le piétinement.

foreign_names.flavor: "Dopo aver visto un branco di questi mostri a caccia insieme, non riesco a immaginare le dimensioni della loro preda." —Adrian Adanto di Lujio
foreign_names.name: Regisauro Capobranco
foreign_names.text:
Gli altri Dinosauri che controlli hanno rapidità.
Quando il Regisauro Capobranco entra nel campo di battaglia, crea una pedina creatura Dinosauro 3/3 verde con travolgere.

foreign_names.flavor: 「この怪物どもが群れを作って狩りをする様子を見ると、こいつらの獲物がどれほど大きいのか想像できず当惑する。」 ――ルージオのエイドリアン・アダント
foreign_names.name: レギサウルスの頭目
foreign_names.text:
あなたがコントロールしている他の恐竜は速攻を持つ。
レギサウルスの頭目が戦場に出たとき、トランプルを持つ緑の３/３の恐竜・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。

foreign_names.flavor: "이 괴수들이 무리를 지어 사냥하는 것을 보니 그 사냥감의 크기가 얼마나 클지 상상이 안 되는군." —루지오의 아드리안 아단토
foreign_names.name: 레기사우루스 우두머리
foreign_names.text:
당신이 조종하는 다른 공룡들은 신속을 가진다.
레기사우루스 우두머리가 전장에 들어올 때, 돌진을 가진 3/3 녹색 공룡 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreign_names.flavor: "Após ver um bando desses monstros caçando juntos, não consigo imaginar o tamanho da presa." — Adrian Adanto, de Lujio
foreign_names.name: Regissauro Alfa
foreign_names.text:
Os outros Dinossauros que você controla têm ímpeto.
Quando Regissauro Alfa entrar no campo de batalha, crie uma ficha de criatura verde 3/3 do tipo Dinossauro com atropelar.

foreign_names.flavor: «Когда я вижу, как эти чудовища охотятся стаей, то не могу даже представить себе, какого размера должна быть их добыча». — Адриан Аданто из Лухио
foreign_names.name: Регизавр-Вожак
foreign_names.text:
Другие Динозавры под вашим контролем имеют Ускорение.
Когда Регизавр-Вожак выходит на поле битвы, создайте одну фишку существа 3/3 зеленый Динозавр с Пробивным ударом.

foreign_names.flavor: 「看见这样的一群猛兽共同狩猎，我都无法想象它们猎物的身型。」 ～卢吉奥的安卓恩艾唐托
foreign_names.name: 帝王龙首领
foreign_names.text:
由你操控的其他恐龙具有敏捷异能。
当帝王龙首领进战场时，派出一个3/3绿色，具践踏异能的恐龙衍生生物。

foreign_names.flavor: 「看見這樣的一群猛獸共同狩獵，我都無法想像牠們獵物的身型。」 ～盧吉奧的安卓恩艾唐托
foreign_names.name: 帝王龍首領
foreign_names.text:
由你操控的其他恐龍具有敏捷異能。
當帝王龍首領進戰場時，派出一個3/3綠色，具踐踏異能的恐龍衍生生物。

name: Regisaur Alpha
original_text:
Other Dinosaurs you control have haste.
When Regisaur Alpha enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.
text:
Other Dinosaurs you control have haste.
When Regisaur Alpha enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

flavor: Cliffs echo and branches quake at the roar of life.

foreign_names.flavor: Das Gebrüll des Lebens lässt auch den stärksten Fels erzittern.
foreign_names.name: Verwurzelter Felsen
foreign_names.text:
Der Verwurzelte Felsen kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst ein Gebirge oder einen Wald.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {R} oder {G}.

foreign_names.flavor: Los ecos rebotan en los acantilados y las ramas se agitan con el rugido de la vida.
foreign_names.name: Risco enraizado
foreign_names.text:
El Risco enraizado entra al campo de batalla girado a menos que controles una Montaña o un Bosque.
{T}: Agrega {R} o {G} a tu reserva de maná.

foreign_names.flavor: Les falaises résonnent et les branches tremblent quand retentit le rugissement de la vie.
foreign_names.name: Mont enraciné
foreign_names.text:
Le Mont enraciné arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé à moins que vous ne contrôliez une montagne ou une forêt.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {G} à votre réserve.

foreign_names.flavor: Le scarpate riecheggiano e i rami tremano al ruggito della vita.
foreign_names.name: Dirupo delle Radici
foreign_names.text:
Il Dirupo delle Radici entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato a meno che tu non controlli una Montagna o una Foresta.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o {G} alla tua riserva di mana.

foreign_names.flavor: 生命の咆哮が断崖に響き枝が震える。
foreign_names.name: 根縛りの岩山
foreign_names.text:
あなたが山か森をコントロールしていないかぎり、根縛りの岩山はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{R}か{G}を加える。

foreign_names.flavor: 생명의 포효 소리에 절벽이 메아리치고 나뭇가지들이 흔들린다.
foreign_names.name: 나무뿌리 바위산
foreign_names.text:
나무뿌리 바위산은 당신이 산이나 숲을 조종하지 않으면 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {R} 또는 {G}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.

foreign_names.flavor: Penhascos ecoam e galhos tremem perante o rugido da vida.
foreign_names.name: Penhasco do Raizame
foreign_names.text:
Penhasco do Raizame entra no campo de batalha virado, a menos que você controle uma Montanha ou uma Floresta.
{T}: Adicione {R} ou {G} à sua reserva de mana.

foreign_names.flavor: От рева жизни трясутся ветви, а утесы отвечают раскатистым эхом.
foreign_names.name: Обвитая Корнями Скала
foreign_names.text:
Обвитая Корнями Скала выходит на поле битвы повернутой, если только под вашим контролем нет Горы или Леса.
{T}: добавьте {R} или {G} в ваше хранилище маны.

foreign_names.flavor: 在生命的咆哮声中，山崖发出回响，树枝剧烈晃动。
foreign_names.name: 盘根峭壁
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控山脉或树林，否则盘根峭壁须横置进战场。
{T}：加{R}或{G}到你的法术力池中。

foreign_names.flavor: 在生命的咆哮聲中，山崖發出迴響，樹枝劇烈晃動。
foreign_names.name: 盤根峭壁
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控山脈或樹林，否則盤根峭壁須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{R}或{G}到你的魔法力池中。

name: Rootbound Crag
original_text:
Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

rulings.text: This checks for lands you control with the land type Mountain or Forest, not for lands named Mountain or Forest. The lands it checks for don’t have to be basic lands. For example, if you control Temple Garden (a nonbasic land with the land types Forest and Plains), Rootbound Crag will enter the battlefield untapped.
As this is entering the battlefield, it checks for lands that are already on the battlefield. It won’t see lands that are entering the battlefield at the same time (due to Warp World, for example).

text:
Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

flavor:
"What we begin, the End-Raze will finish. Then we will dance in Ravnica's rubble."
—Nikya of the Old Ways

foreign_names.flavor:
„Was wir beginnen, wird die Apokalypse beenden. Dann werden wir im Schutt Ravnicas tanzen."
—Nikya, Bewahrerin der Tradition
foreign_names.name: Stampfgelände
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {R} oder {G}.)
Sowie das Stampfgelände ins Spiel kommt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls du dies nicht tust, kommt es getappt ins Spiel.

foreign_names.flavor:
"Lo que comenzamos lo terminará el Arrasamiento Final. Entonces, bailaremos sobre los escombros de Rávnica".
—Nikya de las viejas costumbres
foreign_names.name: Terreno aplastador
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Agrega {R} o {G}.)
En cuanto el Terreno aplastador entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si no lo haces, entra al campo de batalla girado.

foreign_names.flavor:
« Ce que nous commençons, le Grand Terrassement le terminera. Ensuite, nous danserons sur les décombres de Ravnica. »
—Nikya des Traditions
foreign_names.name: Terrain de prédilection
foreign_names.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {G}.)
Au moment où le Terrain de prédilection arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous ne le faites pas, il arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.

foreign_names.flavor:
"Ciò che abbiamo iniziato, lo terminerà la Devastazione finale. Allora balleremo tra le macerie di Ravnica."
—Nikya delle Antiche Usanze
foreign_names.name: Terreno Calpestabile
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {R} o {G}.)
Mentre il Terreno Calpestabile entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se non lo fai, entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.

foreign_names.flavor:
「私たちの始めたことは、終末の祟りが終わらせる。そしたら私たちはラヴニカの瓦礫の中で踊るのよ。」
――旧き道のニーキャ
foreign_names.name: 踏み鳴らされる地
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：{R}か{G}を加える。）
踏み鳴らされる地が戦場に出るに際し、あなたは２点のライフを支払ってもよい。そうしないなら、これはタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreign_names.flavor:
"종말의 파괴가 우리가 시작한 것을 끝마치리라. 그러면 우리는 라브니카의 폐허 위에서 춤추리라."
—고대 전통의 사도 니캬
foreign_names.name: 야수의 영역
foreign_names.text:
({T}: {R} 또는 {G}를 추가한다.)
야수의 영역이 전장에 들어오면서, 당신은 생명 2점을 지불할 수 있다. 그러지 않으면, 야수의 영역은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.

foreign_names.flavor:
"O que nós começarmos, o Arrasamento Final terminará. E então nós dançaremos nos escombros de Ravnica."
— Nikya dos Métodos Antigos
foreign_names.name: Solo Pisoteado
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Adicione {R} ou {G}.
Conforme Solo Pisoteado entra no campo de batalha, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se não fizer isso, ele entrará no campo de batalha virado.

foreign_names.flavor:
«То, что мы начнем, закончит Последнее Разрушение. И тогда мы спляшем на развалинах Равники».
— Никия, приверженка старины
foreign_names.name: Токовище
foreign_names.text:
({T}: добавьте {R} или {G}.)
 При выходе Токовища на поле битвы вы можете заплатить 2 жизни. Если вы этого не делаете, оно выходит на поле битвы повернутым.

foreign_names.flavor:
「我们开的头，会由灭世劫来收尾。然后我们都将在拉尼卡的废墟上起舞。」
～古式信徒妮恰
foreign_names.name: 晃动大地
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{R}或{G}。）
于晃动大地进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则晃动大地须横置进战场。

foreign_names.flavor:
「我們開的頭，會由滅世劫來收尾。然後我們都將在拉尼卡的廢墟上起舞。」
～古式信徒妮恰
foreign_names.name: 晃動大地
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{R}或{G}。）
於晃動大地進戰場時，你可以支付2點生命。如果你未如此作，則晃動大地須橫置進戰場。

name: Stomping Ground
original_text: ({T}: Add {R} or {G}.) As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Stomping Ground
original_text: As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Stomping Ground enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

flavor:
"I'm afraid your dinner got a little . . . overcooked."
—Marlan Farthwald, innkeeper

foreign_names.flavor:
„Tut mir leid, aber dein Abendessen ist etwas … gut durch."
—Marlan Farthwald, Wirt
foreign_names.name: Brutzeln
foreign_names.text:
Dieser Zauberspruch kann nicht neutralisiert werden.
Brutzeln fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Planeswalker deiner Wahl, die bzw. der weiß oder blau ist, 5 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreign_names.flavor:
"Me temo que tu cena está... muy, pero muy hecha".
—Marlan Farthwald, posadero
foreign_names.name: Freír
foreign_names.text:
Este hechizo no puede ser contrarrestado.
Freír hace 5 puntos de daño a la criatura o planeswalker objetivo que sea blanco o azul.

foreign_names.flavor:
« J'ai bien peur que votre dîner ne soit... un peu trop cuit. »
—Marlan Farthwald, tavernier
foreign_names.name: Cramer
foreign_names.text:
Ce sort ne peut pas être contrecarré.
Cramer inflige 5 blessures à une cible, créature ou planeswalker, blanche ou bleue.

foreign_names.flavor:
"Temo che la sua cena sia un po'... troppo cotta."
—Marlan Farthwald, locandiere
foreign_names.name: Friggere
foreign_names.text:
Questa magia non può essere neutralizzata.
Friggere infligge 5 danni a una creatura o a un planeswalker bersaglio di colore bianco o blu.

foreign_names.flavor:
「申し訳ありませんが、夕食は少々……焼き過ぎてしまいました。」
――宿の亭主、マーラン・ファスウォルド
foreign_names.name: 丸焼き
foreign_names.text:
この呪文は打ち消されない。
白か青の、クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とする。丸焼きはそれに５点のダメージを与える。

foreign_names.flavor:
"저녁이 좀 . . . 타버렸는걸."
—여관 주인, 마를란 파르스왈드
foreign_names.name: 튀기기
foreign_names.text:
이 주문은 무효화될 수 없다.
백색 또는 청색인 생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 튀기기는 그 목표에게 피해 5점을 입힌다.

foreign_names.flavor:
"Receio que o seu jantar tenha... passado muito do ponto."
— Marlan Farthwald, estalajadeiro
foreign_names.name: Frigir
foreign_names.text:
Esta mágica não pode ser anulada.
Frigir causa 5 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao planeswalker alvo que seja branco ou azul.

foreign_names.flavor:
«Боюсь, твой обед немного... переготовился».
— Марлан Фартвальд, трактирщик
foreign_names.name: Поджарка
foreign_names.text:
Это заклинание не может быть отменено.
Поджарка наносит 5 повреждений белому или синему целевому существу или planeswalker-у.

foreign_names.flavor:
「你的晚餐恐怕有些. . .糊了。」
～旅店主马兰法斯瓦
foreign_names.name: 煎烤
foreign_names.text:
此咒语不能被反击。
煎烤对目标白色或蓝色的生物或鹏洛客造成5点伤害。

foreign_names.flavor:
「你的晚餐恐怕有些. . .糊了。」
～旅店主馬蘭法斯瓦
foreign_names.name: 煎烤
foreign_names.text:
此咒語不能被反擊。
煎烤對目標白色或藍色的生物或鵬洛客造成5點傷害。

name: Fry
original_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Fry deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker that's white or blue.

rulings.text: A spell or ability that counters spells can still target Fry. When that spell or ability resolves, Fry won’t be countered, but any additional effects of that spell or ability will still happen.

If the target creature or planeswalker is an illegal target by the time Fry tries to resolve, the spell won’t resolve and will be put into its owner’s graveyard with no effect. This is true even though it can’t be countered.

text:
This spell can't be countered.
Fry deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker that's white or blue.

foreign_names.name: Schleier des Sommers
foreign_names.text: Ziehe eine Karte, falls ein Gegner in diesem Zug einen blauen oder schwarzen Zauberspruch gewirkt hat. Zaubersprüche, die du kontrollierst, können in diesem Zug nicht neutralisiert werden. Du und bleibende Karten, die du kontrollierst, erhalten Fluchsicherheit vor Blau und vor Schwarz bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Du und sie können nicht das Ziel von blauen oder schwarzen Zaubersprüchen oder Fähigkeiten sein, die deine Gegner kontrollieren.)

foreign_names.name: Velo del verano
foreign_names.text: Roba una carta si un oponente lanzó un hechizo azul o negro este turno. Los hechizos que controlas no pueden ser contrarrestados este turno. Tú y los permanentes que controlas ganan la habilidad de antimaleficio contra azul y contra negro hasta el final del turno. (Ni tú ni ellos pueden ser objetivo de hechizos o habilidades azules o negros que controlan tus oponentes.)

foreign_names.name: Voile de l'été
foreign_names.text: Piochez une carte si un adversaire a lancé un sort bleu ou noir ce tour-ci. Les sorts que vous contrôlez ne peuvent pas être contrecarrés ce tour-ci. Vous et les permanents que vous contrôlez acquérez la défense talismanique contre le bleu et contre le noir jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Vous et eux ne pouvez pas être les cibles de sorts ou de capacités bleus ou noirs que vos adversaires contrôlent.)

foreign_names.name: Velo dell'Estate
foreign_names.text: Pesca una carta se un avversario ha lanciato una magia blu o nera in questo turno. Le magie che controlli non possono essere neutralizzate in questo turno. Tu e i permanenti che controlli avete anti-malocchio dal blu e dal nero fino alla fine del turno. (Tu e loro non potete essere bersaglio di magie o abilità blu o nere controllate dai tuoi avversari.)

foreign_names.name: 夏の帳
foreign_names.text: このターンに対戦相手が青か黒の呪文を唱えていたなら、カードを１枚引く。このターン、あなたがコントロールしている呪文は打ち消されない。ターン終了時まで、あなたとあなたがコントロールしているパーマネントは青からと黒からの呪禁を得る。（それらは、対戦相手がコントロールしている青や黒の呪文や能力の対象にならない。）

foreign_names.name: 여름의 장막
foreign_names.text: 상대가 이번 턴에 청색 또는 흑색 주문을 발동했다면 카드 한 장을 뽑는다. 당신이 조종하는 주문들은 이 턴에 무효화될 수 없다. 당신 및 당신이 조종하는 지속물들은 턴종료까지 청색 및 흑색으로부터 방호를 얻는다. (당신과 그 지속물들은 상대가 조종하는 청색 또는 흑색인 주문 또는 능력의 목표로 정해질 수 없다.)

foreign_names.name: Véu do Verão
foreign_names.text: Compre um card se um oponente tiver conjurado uma mágica azul ou preta neste turno. As mágicas que você controla não podem ser anuladas neste turno. Você e as permanentes que você controla ganham resistência à magia azul e à magia preta até o final do turno. (Você e elas não podem ser alvo de mágicas nem de habilidades azuis nem pretas controladas por seus oponentes.)

foreign_names.name: Покров Лета
foreign_names.text: Возьмите карту, если оппонент разыграл синее или черное заклинание в этом ходу. Заклинания под вашим контролем не могут быть отменены в этом ходу. Вы и перманенты под вашим контролем получаете Порчеустойчивость от синего и от черного до конца хода. (Вы и они не можете быть целями синих или черных заклинаний или способностей под контролем ваших оппонентов.)

foreign_names.name: 夏色帘幕
foreign_names.text: 如果本回合中有对手施放过蓝色或黑色咒语，则抓一张牌。由你操控的咒语本回合不能被反击。你和由你操控的永久物获得反蓝辟邪与反黑辟邪异能直到回合结束。（你和它们不能成为由对手操控之蓝色或黑色咒语或异能的目标。）

foreign_names.name: 夏色簾幕
foreign_names.text: 如果本回合中有對手施放過藍色或黑色咒語，則抽一張牌。由你操控的咒語本回合不能被反擊。你和由你操控的永久物獲得反藍辟邪與反黑辟邪異能直到回合結束。（你和它們不能成為由對手操控之藍色或黑色咒語或異能的目標。）

name: Veil of Summer
original_text: Draw a card if an opponent has cast a blue or black spell this turn. Spells you control can't be countered this turn. You and permanents you control gain hexproof from blue and from black until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of blue or black spells or abilities your opponents control.)

rulings.text: Veil of Summer has no effect until it resolves. It can be countered.
If your opponents have cast more than one blue or black spell, you still draw only one card as Veil of Summer resolves.

A spell or ability that counters spells can still target your spells after Veil of Summer resolves. When that spell or ability resolves, your spell won’t be countered, but any additional effects of the countering spell or ability will still happen.

text: Draw a card if an opponent has cast a blue or black spell this turn. Spells you control can't be countered this turn. You and permanents you control gain hexproof from blue and from black until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of blue or black spells or abilities your opponents control.)

foreign_names.name: Schleier des Sommers
foreign_names.text: Ziehe eine Karte, falls ein Gegner in diesem Zug einen blauen oder schwarzen Zauberspruch gewirkt hat. Zaubersprüche, die du kontrollierst, können in diesem Zug nicht neutralisiert werden. Du und bleibende Karten, die du kontrollierst, erhalten Fluchsicherheit vor Blau und vor Schwarz bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Du und sie können nicht das Ziel von blauen oder schwarzen Zaubersprüchen oder Fähigkeiten sein, die deine Gegner kontrollieren.)

foreign_names.name: Velo del verano
foreign_names.text: Roba una carta si un oponente lanzó un hechizo azul o negro este turno. Los hechizos que controlas no pueden ser contrarrestados este turno. Tú y los permanentes que controlas ganan la habilidad de antimaleficio contra azul y contra negro hasta el final del turno. (Ni tú ni ellos pueden ser objetivo de hechizos o habilidades azules o negros que controlan tus oponentes.)

foreign_names.name: Voile de l'été
foreign_names.text: Piochez une carte si un adversaire a lancé un sort bleu ou noir ce tour-ci. Les sorts que vous contrôlez ne peuvent pas être contrecarrés ce tour-ci. Vous et les permanents que vous contrôlez acquérez la défense talismanique contre le bleu et contre le noir jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Vous et eux ne pouvez pas être les cibles de sorts ou de capacités bleus ou noirs que vos adversaires contrôlent.)

foreign_names.name: Velo dell'Estate
foreign_names.text: Pesca una carta se un avversario ha lanciato una magia blu o nera in questo turno. Le magie che controlli non possono essere neutralizzate in questo turno. Tu e i permanenti che controlli avete anti-malocchio dal blu e dal nero fino alla fine del turno. (Tu e loro non potete essere bersaglio di magie o abilità blu o nere controllate dai tuoi avversari.)

foreign_names.name: 夏の帳
foreign_names.text: このターンに対戦相手が青か黒の呪文を唱えていたなら、カードを１枚引く。このターン、あなたがコントロールしている呪文は打ち消されない。ターン終了時まで、あなたとあなたがコントロールしているパーマネントは青からと黒からの呪禁を得る。（それらは、対戦相手がコントロールしている青や黒の呪文や能力の対象にならない。）

foreign_names.name: 여름의 장막
foreign_names.text: 상대가 이번 턴에 청색 또는 흑색 주문을 발동했다면 카드 한 장을 뽑는다. 당신이 조종하는 주문들은 이 턴에 무효화될 수 없다. 당신 및 당신이 조종하는 지속물들은 턴종료까지 청색 및 흑색으로부터 방호를 얻는다. (당신과 그 지속물들은 상대가 조종하는 청색 또는 흑색인 주문 또는 능력의 목표로 정해질 수 없다.)

foreign_names.name: Véu do Verão
foreign_names.text: Compre um card se um oponente tiver conjurado uma mágica azul ou preta neste turno. As mágicas que você controla não podem ser anuladas neste turno. Você e as permanentes que você controla ganham resistência à magia azul e à magia preta até o final do turno. (Você e elas não podem ser alvo de mágicas nem de habilidades azuis nem pretas controladas por seus oponentes.)

foreign_names.name: Покров Лета
foreign_names.text: Возьмите карту, если оппонент разыграл синее или черное заклинание в этом ходу. Заклинания под вашим контролем не могут быть отменены в этом ходу. Вы и перманенты под вашим контролем получаете Порчеустойчивость от синего и от черного до конца хода. (Вы и они не можете быть целями синих или черных заклинаний или способностей под контролем ваших оппонентов.)

foreign_names.name: 夏色帘幕
foreign_names.text: 如果本回合中有对手施放过蓝色或黑色咒语，则抓一张牌。由你操控的咒语本回合不能被反击。你和由你操控的永久物获得反蓝辟邪与反黑辟邪异能直到回合结束。（你和它们不能成为由对手操控之蓝色或黑色咒语或异能的目标。）

foreign_names.name: 夏色簾幕
foreign_names.text: 如果本回合中有對手施放過藍色或黑色咒語，則抽一張牌。由你操控的咒語本回合不能被反擊。你和由你操控的永久物獲得反藍辟邪與反黑辟邪異能直到回合結束。（你和它們不能成為由對手操控之藍色或黑色咒語或異能的目標。）

name: Veil of Summer
original_text: Draw a card if an opponent has cast a blue or black spell this turn. Spells you control can't be countered this turn. You and permanents you control gain hexproof from blue and from black until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of blue or black spells or abilities your opponents control.)

rulings.text: Veil of Summer has no effect until it resolves. It can be countered.
If your opponents have cast more than one blue or black spell, you still draw only one card as Veil of Summer resolves.

A spell or ability that counters spells can still target your spells after Veil of Summer resolves. When that spell or ability resolves, your spell won’t be countered, but any additional effects of the countering spell or ability will still happen.

text: Draw a card if an opponent has cast a blue or black spell this turn. Spells you control can't be countered this turn. You and permanents you control gain hexproof from blue and from black until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of blue or black spells or abilities your opponents control.)

foreign_names.name: Vivien Reid
foreign_names.text:
+1: Schaue dir die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst davon eine Kreaturen- oder Länderkarte offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.
−3: Zerstöre ein Artefakt, eine Verzauberung oder eine Kreatur mit Flugfähigkeit deiner Wahl.
−8: Du erhältst ein Emblem mit „Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, erhalten +2/+2, haben Wachsamkeit, Unzerstörbarkeit und verursachen Trampelschaden."

foreign_names.name: Vivien Reid
foreign_names.text:
+1: Mira las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes mostrar una carta de criatura o de tierra que se encuentre entre ellas y ponerla en tu mano. Pon el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en un orden aleatorio.
−3: Destruye el artefacto, encantamiento o criatura con la habilidad de volar objetivo.
−8: Obtienes un emblema con "Las criaturas que controlas obtienen +2/+2 y tienen las habilidades de vigilancia, arrollar e indestructible".

foreign_names.name: Vivien Reid
foreign_names.text:
+1 : Regardez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez révéler une carte de créature ou de terrain parmi elles et la mettre dans votre main. Mettez le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans un ordre aléatoire.
-3 : Détruisez l'artefact ciblé, l'enchantement ciblé ou la créature avec le vol ciblée.
-8 : Vous gagnez un emblème avec « Les créatures que vous contrôlez gagnent +2/+2 et ont la vigilance, le piétinement et l'indestructible. »

foreign_names.name: Vivien Reid
foreign_names.text:
+1: Guarda le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi rivelare una carta creatura o terra scelta tra esse e aggiungerla alla tua mano. Metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in ordine casuale.
-3: Distruggi un artefatto, un incantesimo o una creatura con volare bersaglio.
-8: Ottieni un emblema con "Le creature che controlli prendono +2/+2 e hanno cautela, travolgere e indistruttibile".

foreign_names.name: ビビアン・リード
foreign_names.text:
+1：あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを４枚見る。あなたはその中からクリーチャーか土地であるカード１枚を公開してあなたの手札に加えてもよい。残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に無作為の順番で置く。
-3：アーティファクト１つかエンチャント１つか飛行を持つクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
-8：あなたは「あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーは＋２/＋２の修整を受け、警戒とトランプルと破壊不能を持つ。」を持つ紋章を得る。

foreign_names.name: 비비안 레이드
foreign_names.text:
+1: 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 네 장을 본다. 당신은 그중에서 생물 또는 대지 카드 한 장을 공개하고 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 나머지 카드들은 무작위 순서로 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓는다.
−3: 마법물체, 부여마법 또는 비행을 가진 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 파괴한다.
−8: 당신은 "당신이 조종하는 생물들은 +2/+2를 받고 경계, 돌진, 무적을 가진다."를 가진 휘장을 얻는다.

foreign_names.name: Vivien Reid
foreign_names.text:
+1: Olhe os quatro cards do topo do seu grimório. Você pode revelar um card de criatura ou terreno dentre eles e colocá-lo em sua mão. Coloque o restante no fundo de seu grimório em ordem aleatória.
−3: Destrua o artefato, encantamento ou criatura com voar alvo.
−8: Você recebe um emblema com "As criaturas que você controla recebem +2/+2 e têm vigilância, atropelar e indestrutível."

foreign_names.name: Вивьен Рейд
foreign_names.text:
+1: посмотрите четыре верхние карты вашей библиотеки. Вы можете показать находящуюся среди них карту существа или земли и положить ее в вашу руку. Положите остальные карты в низ вашей библиотеки в случайном порядке.
−3: уничтожьте целевой артефакт, чары или существо с Полетом.
—8: вы получаете эмблему со способностью «Существа под вашим контролем получают +2/+2 и имеют Бдительность, Пробивной удар и Неразрушимость».

foreign_names.name: 薇薇安瑞德
foreign_names.text:
+1：检视你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以展示其中的一张生物或地牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。
−3：消灭目标神器，结界或具飞行异能的生物。
−8：你获得具有「由你操控的生物得+2/+2且具有警戒，践踏与不灭异能」的徽记。

foreign_names.name: 薇薇安瑞德
foreign_names.text:
+1：檢視你牌庫頂的四張牌。你可以展示其中的一張生物或地牌，並將它置於你手上。將其餘的牌以隨機順序置於你的牌庫底。
−3：消滅目標神器，結界或具飛行異能的生物。
-8：你獲得具有「由你操控的生物得+2/+2且具有警戒，踐踏與不滅異能」的徽記。

name: Vivien Reid
original_text:
+1: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
-3: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
-8: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have vigilance, trample, and indestructible."

foreign_names.name: Glühende Ranken
foreign_names.text:
Immer wenn ein Gegner einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch wirkt, fügen ihm die Glühenden Ranken 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
{1}, opfere die Glühenden Ranken: Zerstöre ein Artefakt oder eine Verzauberung deiner Wahl. Die Glühenden Ranken fügen dem Beherrscher der bleibenden Karte 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreign_names.name: Lianas de ceniza
foreign_names.text:
Siempre que un oponente lance un hechizo que no sea de criatura, las Lianas de ceniza hacen 1 punto de daño a ese jugador.
{1}, sacrificar las Lianas de ceniza: Destruye el artefacto o encantamiento objetivo. Las Lianas de ceniza hacen 2 puntos de daño al controlador de ese permanente.

foreign_names.name: Cendrelianes
foreign_names.text:
À chaque fois qu'un adversaire lance un sort non-créature, les Cendrelianes infligent 1 blessure à ce joueur.
{1}, sacrifiez les Cendrelianes : Détruisez l'artefact ciblé ou l'enchantement ciblé. Les Cendrelianes infligent 2 blessures au contrôleur de ce permanent.

foreign_names.name: Liane di Cenere
foreign_names.text:
Ogniqualvolta un avversario lancia una magia non creatura, le Liane di Cenere infliggono 1 danno a quel giocatore.
{1}, Sacrifica le Liane di Cenere: Distruggi un artefatto o un incantesimo bersaglio. Le Liane di Cenere infliggono 2 danni al controllore di quel permanente.

foreign_names.name: 燃えがら蔦
foreign_names.text:
対戦相手がクリーチャーでない呪文を唱えるたび、燃えがら蔦はそのプレイヤーに１点のダメージを与える。
{1}, 燃えがら蔦を生け贄に捧げる：アーティファクト１つかエンチャント１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。燃えがら蔦はそのパーマネントのコントローラーに２点のダメージを与える。

foreign_names.name: 잿불채찍
foreign_names.text:
상대가 생물이 아닌 주문을 발동할 때마다, 잿불채찍은 그 플레이어에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.
{1}, 잿불채찍을 희생한다: 마법물체나 부여마법을 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 파괴한다. 잿불채찍은 그 지속물의 조종자에게 피해 2점을 입힌다.

foreign_names.name: Lianas Ardentes
foreign_names.text:
Toda vez que um oponente conjura uma mágica que não seja de criatura, Lianas Ardentes causa 1 ponto de dano àquele jogador.
{1}, sacrifique Lianas Ardentes: Destrua o artefato ou o encantamento alvo. Lianas Ardentes causa 2 pontos de dano ao controlador daquela permanente.

foreign_names.name: Пепельные Лианы
foreign_names.text:
Каждый раз, когда оппонент разыгрывает не являющееся существом заклинание, Пепельные Лианы наносят 1 повреждение тому игроку.
{1}, пожертвуйте Пепельные Лианы: уничтожьте целевой артефакт или чары. Пепельные Лианы наносят 2 повреждения игроку, контролирующему тот перманент.

foreign_names.name: 烬火藤蔓
foreign_names.text:
每当任一对手施放非生物咒语时，烬火藤蔓对该牌手造成1点伤害。
{1}，牺牲烬火藤蔓：消灭目标神器或结界。烬火藤蔓对该永久物的操控者造成2点伤害。

foreign_names.name: 燼火藤蔓
foreign_names.text:
每當任一對手施放非生物咒語時，燼火藤蔓對該玩家造成1點傷害。
{1}，犧牲燼火藤蔓：消滅目標神器或結界。燼火藤蔓對該永久物的操控者造成2點傷害。

name: Cindervines
original_text:
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, Cindervines deals 1 damage to that player.
{1}, Sacrifice Cindervines: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Cindervines deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.

rulings.text: Cindervines’s triggered ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.

If the target permanent is an illegal target by the time Cindervines’s activated ability tries to resolve, the ability doesn’t resolve. No player is dealt damage. If the target is legal but not destroyed (most likely because it has indestructible), its controller is dealt damage.

Cindervines can be the target of its own activated ability. The ability won’t resolve since it won’t have a legal target, and no player will be dealt damage, but this does allow you to sacrifice Cindervines without another enchantment to target if you want to.

foreign_names.name: Wächtertotem
foreign_names.text:

{T}, exiliar el Tótem centinela: Exilia todas las cartas de todos los cementerios.

foreign_names.name: Totem sentinelle

{T}, exilez le Totem sentinelle : Exilez toutes les cartes de tous les cimetières.

foreign_names.name: Sentinella Totemica
foreign_names.text:
Quando la Sentinella Totemica entra nel campo di battaglia, profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.)
{T}, Esilia la Sentinella Totemica: Esilia tutte le carte da tutti i cimiteri.

foreign_names.name: 歩哨のトーテム像
foreign_names.text:
歩哨のトーテム像が戦場に出たとき、占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）
{T}, 歩哨のトーテム像を追放する：墓地すべてからカードをすべて追放する。

foreign_names.name: 보초 토템
foreign_names.text:

{T}, 보초의 토템을 추방한다: 모든 무덤에서 모든 카드를 추방한다.

foreign_names.name: Totem Sentinela
foreign_names.text:

{T}, exile Totem Sentinela: Exile todos os cards de todos os cemitérios.

foreign_names.name: Сторожевой Тотем
foreign_names.text:
Когда Сторожевой Тотем выходит на поле битвы, предскажите 1. (Посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)
{T}, изгоните Сторожевой Тотем: изгоните все карты из всех кладбищ.

foreign_names.name: 哨戒图腾像
foreign_names.text:
当哨戒图腾像进战场时，占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）
{T}，放逐哨戒图腾像：放逐所有坟墓场中的所有牌。

foreign_names.name: 哨戒圖騰像
foreign_names.text:
當哨戒圖騰像進戰場時，占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）
{T}，放逐哨戒圖騰像：放逐所有墳墓場中的所有牌。

original_text:
When Sentinel Totem enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}, Exile Sentinel Totem: Exile all cards from all graveyards.

name: Etali, Primal Storm
original_text: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

rulings.text: If an exiled card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.

If you cast any of the exiled cards, you do so as part of the resolution of the triggered ability. You can’t wait to cast them later in the turn. Timing permissions based on a card’s type are ignored, and the spells resolve before blockers are declared.

If you cast more than one of the exiled cards, you choose the order in which to cast them. A spell you cast this way can be the target of a later spell you cast this way. However, permanent spells cast this way won’t resolve until you’re done casting spells, so the permanents they become can’t be the target of spells cast this way. For example, if you exile Twincast and Lightning Strike, you can cast Lightning Strike and then cast Twincast targeting it; but if you exile a creature card and an Aura card, you can’t cast that Aura targeting that creature.

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t pay any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, such as that of Silvergill Adept, those must be paid to cast the card.
Any cards not cast, including land cards, remain in exile. They can’t be cast on later turns, even if Etali attacks again.
Because all attacking creatures are chosen at once, a creature cast this way can’t attack during the same combat as Etali, even if it has haste.
In a multiplayer game, if a player leaves the game, all cards that player owns leave as well. If you leave the game, any spells or permanents you control from Etali’s ability are exiled.

text: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

Каждый раз, когда Гишат, Аватара Солнца наносит боевые повреждения игроку, покажите столько же карт с верха вашей библиотеки. Положите любое количество находящихся среди них карт существ-Динозавров на поле битвы, а остальные в низ вашей библиотеки в случайном порядке.

foreign_names.name: 烈阳化身基撒斯
foreign_names.text:
践踏，警戒，敏捷
每当烈阳化身基撒斯对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，从你的牌库顶展示等量的牌。将其中任意数量的恐龙生物牌放进战场，其余的牌则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

foreign_names.name: 烈陽化身基撒斯
foreign_names.text:
踐踏，警戒，敏捷

name: Gishath, Sun's Avatar
original_text:
Trample, vigilance, haste
Whenever Gishath, Sun's Avatar deals combat damage to a player, reveal that many cards from the top of your library. Put any number of Dinosaur creature cards from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

rulings.text: If you have fewer cards in your library than the amount of damage Gishath deals, you reveal the cards you have. Because you’re not drawing cards, you don’t lose the game.

foreign_names.flavor: 中にいるものにとっては、この檻はるつぼでしかない。怒りを純粋で恐ろしい何かへと凝縮するのだ。

foreign_names.flavor: 우리는 분노를 키우기 위한 도가니이며, 분노는 그 안에서 더 순수하고 끔찍한 것으로 변한다.

foreign_names.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 +1/+1을 받고 이단공격을 얻는다. (이 생물은 선제공격 전투피해와 일반 전투피해를 둘 다 입힌다.)

foreign_names.flavor: A jaula é um crisol da fúria que cresce por dentro, refinando-a, tornando-a uma coisa pura e terrível.
foreign_names.name: Fúria Liberta

foreign_names.text: Целевое существо получает +1/+1 и Двойной удар до конца хода. (Оно наносит боевые повреждения как на этапе Первого удара, так и на этапе обычных повреждений.)

foreign_names.flavor: 这铁笼好似熔炉，不断锤炼遭羁其中者积累的怒火，将其锻成更纯粹可怕之物。

foreign_names.flavor: 번개를 다루려면 혼돈을 길들여야 한다.

name: Lightning Strike
original_text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.
text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

flavor: "We agree that life should flourish. We disagree on the optimal number of limbs."

foreign_names.flavor: „Wir sind uns einig, dass das Leben gedeihen sollte. Nur bei der optimalen Anzahl an Extremitäten gibt es Meinungsverschiedenheiten."
foreign_names.name: Bund des Gedeihens
foreign_names.text: Schaue dir die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst davon eine bleibende Karte offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek. Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreign_names.flavor: "Estamos de acuerdo en que la vida debería florecer, pero aún no hemos resuelto la cantidad óptima de extremidades".
foreign_names.name: Vínculo de florecimiento
foreign_names.text: Mira las tres primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes mostrar una carta de permanente que se encuentre entre ellas y ponerla en tu mano. Pon el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden. Ganas 3 vidas.

foreign_names.flavor: « Nous sommes d'accord pour dire que la vie doit s'épanouir. Nous ne sommes pas d'accord sur le nombre optimal de branches. »
foreign_names.name: Lien d'abondance
foreign_names.text: Regardez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez révéler une carte de permanent parmi elles et la mettre dans votre main. Mettez le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque, dans l'ordre de votre choix. Vous gagnez 3 points de vie.

foreign_names.flavor: "Concordiamo sul fatto che la vita debba prosperare. Discordiamo sul numero ottimale di arti."
foreign_names.name: Vincolo di Prosperità
foreign_names.text: Guarda le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi rivelare una carta permanente scelta tra esse e aggiungerla alla tua mano. Metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine. Guadagni 3 punti vita.

foreign_names.flavor: 「生命が繁茂すべきという点は意見が一致している。手足は何本が最適かという点では見解が違うけれど。」
foreign_names.name: 繁茂の絆
foreign_names.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを３枚見る。あなたはその中からパーマネント・カード１枚を公開してあなたの手札に加えてもよい。残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置く。あなたは３点のライフを得る。

foreign_names.flavor: "우리는 생명이 융성해야 한다는 것에 동의한다. 사지가 몇 개 있어야 적절한지에는 동의하지 않는다."
foreign_names.name: 융성의 유대
foreign_names.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 세 장을 본다. 당신은 그중에서 지속물 카드 한 장을 공개하고 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 나머지 카드들은 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 원하는 순서로 놓는다. 당신은 생명 3점을 얻는다.

foreign_names.flavor: "Concordamos que a vida deve florescer. Discordamos quanto ao número ideal de membros."
foreign_names.name: Elo do Florescimento
foreign_names.text: Olhe os três cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode revelar um card de permanente dentre eles e colocá-lo em sua mão. Coloque o restante no fundo de seu grimório em qualquer ordem. Você ganha 3 pontos de vida.

foreign_names.flavor: «Мы согласны с тем, что жизнь должна процветать. У нас разногласия по оптимальному числу конечностей».
foreign_names.name: Узы Расцвета
foreign_names.text: Посмотрите три верхние карты вашей библиотеки. Вы можете показать находящуюся среди них карту перманента и положить ее в вашу руку. Положите остальные карты в низ вашей библиотеки в любом порядке. Вы получаете 3 жизни.

foreign_names.flavor: 「我们都同意生命应得滋养绽放，但对手脚的最优数量有所分歧。」
foreign_names.name: 茁壮璧合
foreign_names.text: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。你可以展示其中的一张永久物牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。你获得3点生命。

foreign_names.flavor: 「我們都同意生命應得滋養綻放，但對手腳的最優數量有所分歧。」
foreign_names.name: 茁壯璧合
foreign_names.text: 檢視你牌庫頂的三張牌。你可以展示其中的一張永久物牌，並將它置於你手上。將其餘的牌以任意順序置於你牌庫底。你獲得3點生命。

name: Bond of Flourishing
original_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You gain 3 life.

rulings.text: A permanent card is an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card.
You gain 3 life even if you don’t reveal a permanent card from among the top three cards of your library.

text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You gain 3 life.

flavor: "When civilization teeters on the brink, I'll be there to kick it the rest of the way."

foreign_names.flavor: „Wenn die Zivilisation am Abgrund steht, werde ich ihr zum nächsten Schritt verhelfen."
foreign_names.name: Domris Hinterhalt
foreign_names.text: Lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst. Dann fügt sie einer Kreatur oder einem Planeswalker deiner Wahl, die bzw. den du nicht kontrollierst, Schadenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.

foreign_names.flavor: "Cuando la civilización esté al borde del abismo, yo estaré ahí para darle una patada".
foreign_names.name: Emboscada de Domri
foreign_names.text: Pon un contador +1/+1 sobre la criatura objetivo que controlas. Luego, esa criatura hace una cantidad de daño igual a su fuerza a la criatura o planeswalker objetivo que no controlas.

foreign_names.flavor: « Quand la civilisation sera sur le point de s'effondrer, je serai là pour lui asséner le coup de grâce. »
foreign_names.name: Embuscade de Domri
foreign_names.text: Mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez. Ensuite, cette créature inflige un nombre de blessures égal à sa force à une créature ciblée ou à un planeswalker ciblé que vous ne contrôlez pas.

foreign_names.flavor: "Quando la civiltà sarà sull'orlo del baratro, sarò lì per darle la spinta finale."
foreign_names.name: Imboscata di Domri
foreign_names.text: Metti un segnalino +1/+1 su una creatura bersaglio che controlli. Poi quella creatura infligge danno pari alla sua forza a una creatura o a un planeswalker bersaglio che non controlli.

foreign_names.flavor: 「文明が崩壊の瀬戸際にあるのなら、俺が蹴飛ばしてけりを付けてやるさ。」
foreign_names.name: ドムリの待ち伏せ
foreign_names.text: あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体と、あなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャーかプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とする。その前者の上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置く。その後、その前者はその後者に、自身のパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与える。

foreign_names.flavor: "문명이 벼랑 끝에 선 위태로운 상태가 되면, 내가 걷어차서 마무리를 해 주겠어."
foreign_names.name: 돔리의 매복
foreign_names.text: 당신이 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다. 그 후 당신이 조종하지 않는 생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 첫 번째 목표는 두 번째 목표에게 자신의 공격력만큼 피해를 입힌다.

foreign_names.flavor: "Quando a civilização estiver à beira do abismo, eu vou estar lá para dar o chute final."
foreign_names.name: Emboscada de Domri
foreign_names.text: Coloque um marcador +1/+1 na criatura alvo que você controla. Em seguida, aquela criatura causa uma quantidade de dano igual ao próprio poder à criatura ou ao planeswalker alvo que você não controla.

foreign_names.flavor: «Когда цивилизация окажется на краю пропасти, я буду рядом, чтобы дать ей хорошего пинка».
foreign_names.name: Засада Домри
foreign_names.text: Положите один жетон +1/+1 на целевое существо под вашим контролем. Затем то существо наносит повреждения, равные своей силе, целевому существу или planeswalker-у не под вашим контролем.

foreign_names.flavor: 「文明在崩溃边缘时，我就会去把它踢下深渊。」
foreign_names.name: 多密的伏击
foreign_names.text: 在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。然后该生物对目标不由你操控的生物或鹏洛客造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。

foreign_names.flavor: 「文明在崩潰邊緣時，我就會去把它踢下深淵。」
foreign_names.name: 多密的伏擊

name: Domri's Ambush
original_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

rulings.text: You can’t cast Domri’s Ambush unless you choose both a creature you control and a creature or planeswalker you don’t control as targets.
If either target is an illegal target as Domri’s Ambush tries to resolve, the creature you control won’t deal damage.

If the creature you control is an illegal target as Domri’s Ambush tries to resolve, you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it. If that creature is a legal target but the other target isn’t, you’ll still put the counter on the creature you control.

name: Domri, Anarch of Bolas
original_text:
Creatures you control get +1/+0.
+1: Add {R} or {G}. Creature spells you cast this turn can't be countered.
-2: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

rulings.text: Because it’s a loyalty ability, Domri’s first loyalty ability isn’t a mana ability. It can be activated only any time you could cast a sorcery. It uses the stack and can be responded to.
After Domri’s first loyalty ability has resolved, no creature spells you cast can be countered during that turn, not just the one you spend the mana on.

A spell or ability that counters spells can still target a creature spell you control after Domri’s first loyalty ability has resolved. When that spell or ability resolves, the creature spell won’t be countered, but any additional effects of that spell or ability will still happen.

If Domri leaves the battlefield before his last ability resolves, most likely because he only had 2 loyalty when you activated the ability, the creature won’t have +1/+0 from Domri’s static ability while it fights.
If either target is an illegal target as Domri’s last ability resolves, no creature will deal or be dealt damage.

foreign_names.text: 격노 — 배회하는 랩터들이 피해를 입을 때마다, 당신은 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아 탭된 채로 전장에 놓을 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreign_names.flavor: Eles percorrem o próprio território como uma maré de dentes e garras.
foreign_names.name: Raptores Andarilhos
foreign_names.text: Enfurecer — Toda vez que Raptores Andarilhos sofre dano, você pode procurar em seu grimório um card de terreno básico, colocá-lo no campo de batalha virado e depois embaralhar seu grimório.

foreign_names.flavor: Они покрывают свою территорию, словно прилив из зубов и когтей.
foreign_names.name: Вольные Рапторы
foreign_names.text: Неистовство — Каждый раз, когда Вольным Рапторам наносятся повреждения, вы можете найти в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли, положить ее на поле битвы повернутой, затем перетасовать вашу библиотеку.

foreign_names.flavor: 它们用尖牙利爪的浪潮掩盖了自己的领域。
foreign_names.name: 漫群迅猛龙
foreign_names.text: 激怒～每当漫群迅猛龙受到伤害时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreign_names.flavor: 牠們用尖牙利爪的浪潮掩蓋了自己的領域。
foreign_names.name: 漫群迅猛龍
foreign_names.text: 激怒～每當漫群迅猛龍受到傷害時，你可以從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，將之橫置放進戰場，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。

name: Ranging Raptors
original_text: Enrage — Whenever Ranging Raptors is dealt damage, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: If multiple sources deal damage to a creature with an enrage ability at the same time, most likely because multiple creatures blocked that creature, the enrage ability triggers only once.

If lethal damage is dealt to a creature with an enrage ability, that ability triggers. The creature with that enrage ability leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, so it won’t be affected by the resolving ability.

text: Enrage — Whenever Ranging Raptors is dealt damage, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

flavor: They cover their territory like a tide of teeth and claws.

foreign_names.flavor: Das Letzte, was du siehst, ist ein Meer aus Klauen und Zähnen.
foreign_names.name: Umherstreifende Raptoren
foreign_names.text: Erzürnen — Immer wenn den Umherstreifenden Raptoren Schaden zugefügt wird, kannst du deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte durchsuchen, sie getappt ins Spiel bringen und dann deine Bibliothek mischen.

foreign_names.flavor: Cubren su territorio como una ola de dientes y garras.
foreign_names.name: Ráptores al ataque
foreign_names.text: Enfurecer — Siempre que los Ráptores al ataque reciban daño, puedes buscar en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica, ponerla en el campo de batalla girada y luego barajar tu biblioteca.

foreign_names.flavor: La multitude recouvre son territoire telle une marée de dents et de griffes.
foreign_names.name: Multitude de raptors
foreign_names.text: Rage — À chaque fois que la Multitude de raptors subit des blessures, vous pouvez chercher dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base, la mettre sur le champ de bataille engagée, puis mélanger votre bibliothèque.

foreign_names.flavor: Battono il loro territorio come una marea di zanne e artigli.
foreign_names.name: Raptor Raminghi
foreign_names.text: Infuriare — Ogniqualvolta viene inflitto danno ai Raptor Raminghi, puoi passare in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base, metterla sul campo di battaglia TAPpata, poi rimescolare il tuo grimorio.

foreign_names.flavor: 歯と爪の潮流のように縄張りを守っている。
foreign_names.name: 群棲する猛竜
foreign_names.text: 激昂 ― 群棲する猛竜にダメージが与えられるたび、あなたはあなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カード１枚を探してもよい。そうしたなら、それをタップ状態で戦場に出し、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

flavor:
"The Brazen Coalition is a firecannon pointed at our enemies. Goblins like him are the spark to its powder." 
—Admiral Beckett Brass

foreign_names.flavor: „Die Tollkühne Koalition ist die Feuerkanone, die wir auf unsere Gegner richten. Und Goblins wie er sind der Funke, der die Lunte entfacht." —Admiralin Beckett Tollkun
foreign_names.name: Fanatischer Hitzkopf
foreign_names.text:
Eile
{T}, opfere den Fanatischen Hitzkopf: Er fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreign_names.flavor: "La Coalición Azófar es un cañón ígneo que apunta a nuestros enemigos. Los trasgos como él son la chispa de la pólvora". —Almirante Beckett Azófar
foreign_names.name: Fanático flamígero
foreign_names.text:
Prisa.
{T}, sacrificar el Fanático flamígero: Hace 1 punto de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.

foreign_names.flavor: « La Coalition des hardis est un pyrocanon pointé sur nos ennemis. Les gobelins de son espèce mettent le feu aux poudres. » —Amirale Beckett Hardiesce
foreign_names.name: Brandon fanatique
foreign_names.text:
Célérité
{T}, sacrifiez le Brandon fanatique : Il inflige 1 blessure à une cible, créature ou joueur.

foreign_names.flavor: "L'Alleanza di Bronzo è una bocca di fuoco puntata sui nostri nemici. I goblin come lui sono la scintilla che ne innesca la miccia." —Ammiraglio Beckett Cuor di Bronzo
foreign_names.name: Aizzatore Fanatico
foreign_names.text:
Rapidità
{T}, Sacrifica l'Aizzatore Fanatico: Infligge 1 danno a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.

foreign_names.flavor: 「鉄面連合は敵に狙いを定めた火炎砲だ。ああいうゴブリンが、その火薬に火を付けるのさ。」 ――鉄面提督ベケット
foreign_names.name: 狂信的扇動者
foreign_names.text:
速攻
{T}, 狂信的扇動者を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。これはそれに１点のダメージを与える。

foreign_names.flavor: "브레이즌 연합은 적들을 향해 겨눠진 대포이다. 저자과 같은 고블린들은 화약에 불을 붙이는 불씨고." —베케트 브라스 제독
foreign_names.name: 광적인 선동가
foreign_names.text:
신속
{T}, 광적인 선동가를 희생한다: 생물이나 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 광적인 선동가는 그 목표에 피해 1점을 입힌다.

foreign_names.flavor: "A Coalisão Brônzea é um canhão apontado para nossos inimigos. Os goblins como ele são a centelha de sua pólvora." — Almirante Beckett Bronze
foreign_names.name: Instigador Fanático
foreign_names.text:
Ímpeto
{T}, sacrifique Instigador Fanático: Ele causa 1 ponto de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.

foreign_names.flavor: «Бравый Союз — это огнепушка, направленная на наших врагов. Гоблины вроде него — искра, поджигающая порох». — адмирал Беккет Бравада
foreign_names.name: Фанатик-Поджигатель
foreign_names.text:
Ускорение
{T}, пожертвуйте Фанатика-Поджигателя: он наносит 1 повреждение целевому существу или игроку.

foreign_names.flavor: 「莽霸联盟是一门瞄准敌人的火炎炮。像他这样的鬼怪就是点燃火药的火花。」 ～贝克蒂霸司总帅
foreign_names.name: 狂热惹事鬼
foreign_names.text:
敏捷
{T}，牺牲狂热惹事鬼：它对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

foreign_names.flavor: 「莽霸聯盟是一門瞄準敵人的火炎炮。像他這樣的鬼怪就是點燃火藥的火花。」 ～貝克蒂霸司總帥
foreign_names.name: 狂熱惹事鬼
foreign_names.text:
敏捷
{T}，犧牲狂熱惹事鬼：它對目標生物或玩家造成1點傷害。

name: Fanatical Firebrand
original_text:
Haste
{T}, Sacrifice Fanatical Firebrand: It deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
text:
Haste
{T}, Sacrifice Fanatical Firebrand: It deals 1 damage to any target.

flavor: Despite their stake in the city's survival, Rakdos cultists are loath to pass up any opportunity to sow chaos.

foreign_names.flavor: Die Rakdos-Kultisten können einfach keine Gelegenheit ungenutzt lassen, Chaos zu stiften — auch nicht, wenn es um das Überleben der Stadt geht.
foreign_names.name: Chaosteufel
foreign_names.text: Immer wenn ein Spieler eine bleibende Karte opfert, fügt der Chaosteufel einem Ziel deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreign_names.flavor: A pesar de que la supervivencia de la ciudad estaba en juego, los cultistas de Rakdos son reacios a dejar pasar cualquier oportunidad de sembrar el caos.
foreign_names.name: Diablo del caos
foreign_names.text: Siempre que un jugador sacrifique un permanente, el Diablo del caos hace 1 punto de daño a cualquier objetivo.

foreign_names.flavor: Bien qu'ayant tout intérêt à ce que la cité survive, les cultistes de Rakdos répugnent à gâcher une occasion de semer le chaos.
foreign_names.name: Diable du carnage
foreign_names.text: À chaque fois qu'un joueur sacrifie un permanent, le Diable du carnage inflige 1 blessure à n'importe quelle cible.

foreign_names.flavor: Nonostante il loro interesse per la sopravvivenza della città, i cultisti Rakdos sono riluttanti a lasciarsi sfuggire qualsiasi occasione per seminare il caos.
foreign_names.name: Diavolo del Pandemonio
foreign_names.text: Ogniqualvolta un giocatore sacrifica un permanente, il Diavolo del Pandemonio infligge 1 danno a un qualsiasi bersaglio.

foreign_names.flavor: 街の存続に利害があるにも関わらず、ラクドスの信者は混沌を巻き起こす機会を見逃さずにはいられなかった。
foreign_names.name: 波乱の悪魔
foreign_names.text: プレイヤーがパーマネントを１つ生け贄に捧げるたび、クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。波乱の悪魔はそれに１点のダメージを与える。

foreign_names.flavor: 도시의 생존이 경각에 달려 있는 순간에도, 락도스 광신단원들은 혼란을 일으킬 수 있는 기회를 그냥 넘겨버리는 일을 꺼렸다.
foreign_names.name: 아수라장 마귀
foreign_names.text: 플레이어가 지속물을 희생할 때마다, 원하는 목표를 정한다. 아수라장 마귀는 그 목표에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.

foreign_names.flavor: A despeito do próprio interesse na sobrevivência da cidade, os cultistas de Rakdos odeiam deixar passar uma oportunidade de semear o caos.
foreign_names.name: Diabo do Pandemônio
foreign_names.text: Toda vez que um jogador sacrifica uma permanente, Diabo do Pandemônio causa 1 ponto de dano a qualquer alvo.

foreign_names.flavor: Даже рискуя выживанием города, Ракдосы не могли отказаться от возможности посеять хаос.
foreign_names.name: Дьявол Безумия
foreign_names.text: Каждый раз, когда игрок жертвует перманент, Дьявол Безумия наносит 1 повреждение любой цели.

foreign_names.flavor: 虽然城市存亡攸关拉铎司教众生死，但他们绝不愿放过任何制造混乱的机会。
foreign_names.name: 破坏魔鬼
foreign_names.text: 每当任一牌手牺牲一个永久物时，破坏魔鬼对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

foreign_names.flavor: 雖然城市存亡攸關拉鐸司教眾生死，但他們絕不願放過任何製造混亂的機會。
foreign_names.name: 破壞魔鬼
foreign_names.text: 每當任一玩家犧牲一個永久物時，破壞魔鬼對任意一個目標造成1點傷害。

name: Mayhem Devil
original_text: Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, Mayhem Devil deals 1 damage to any target.

rulings.text: You control Mayhem Devil’s triggered ability and choose the target, no matter who sacrificed the permanent.

If a permanent is sacrificed to pay a cost of a spell or ability, Mayhem Devil’s ability will resolve before that spell or ability. Conversely, if a permanent is sacrificed during the resolution of a spell or ability, that spell or ability will finish resolving before Mayhem Devil’s ability is put onto the stack.

Mayhem Devil itself doesn’t allow any player to sacrifice any permanents. Its ability triggers whenever a player sacrifices a permanent because some other spell, ability, or cost instructed the player to do so.
If you sacrifice Mayhem Devil, its ability triggers.
A legendary permanent that is put into a graveyard because of the “legend rule” isn’t sacrificed.

text: Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, Mayhem Devil deals 1 damage to any target.

flavor: The tools of invention became the weapons of revolution.

foreign_names.flavor: Die Werkzeuge der Erfinder wurden zu Waffen der Revolution.
foreign_names.name: Schock
foreign_names.text: Der Schock fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreign_names.flavor: Las herramientas de invención se convirtieron en las armas de la revolución.
foreign_names.name: Choque
foreign_names.text: El Choque hace 2 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo.

foreign_names.flavor: Les outils de l'invention devinrent les armes de la révolution.

foreign_names.flavor: Gli strumenti dell'invenzione divennero le armi della rivoluzione.

foreign_names.text: 원하는 목표를 정한다. 충격은 그 목표에게 피해 2점을 입힌다.
